diamond.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a clear, very hard valuable stone, used in jewellery and in industry
diamond.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a shape with four straight but sloping sides of equal length, with one point facing directly up and the other directly down
diamond.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Cut the cookie dough into diamonds.
diamond.translation[0].definitions[2].de: one of the four suits (=types of cards) in a set of playing cards, which has the design of a red diamond shape on it
diamond.translation[0].definitions[3].ex: You have to play a diamond.
diamond.translation[0].definitions[4].de: the area in a baseball field that is within the diamond shape formed by the four bases
diamond.translation[0].definitions[5].de: the whole playing field used in baseball
